links.title: IBM Storage Insights GUI Link
links.tooltip: Link to IBM Storage Insights Dashboard

options.content: Tenant Level Summary Information

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of block storage systems within the SI Tenant and their operational status. The operational status reflects the most critical condition detected across the storage system and its internal resources, providing a comprehensive view of system health.
panels.title: Block Storages Health

panels.description: This panel details the capacity stats across the block devices of SI tenant.
panels.title: Total Systems Capacity

panels.description:
This panel details the capacity mapping information to a host.

Mapped Capacity: Total capacity of volumes assigned to hosts.
Unmapped Capacity: Total capacity of volumes not assigned to any hosts.
panels.title: Host Capacity Mapping

panels.description: This panel details the capacity stats across the block devices of SI tenant.

options.content: System Level Information : $DeviceNames

panels.description:
This panel details the capacity mapping information to a host.

Mapped Capacity: Total capacity of volumes assigned to hosts.
Unmapped Capacity: Total capacity of volumes not assigned to any hosts.
panels.title: Host Capacity Mapping

panels.description: This panel details the capacity stats across the block devices of SI tenant.

panels.title: Block Devices - Alert Data - Tenant Level
Block Devices - Health Data - Tenant Level
Block Devices - Capacity Data - Tenant Level

panels.description: List of Volumes present in the table and it shows a maximum of 500 only.
panels.title: Volume Snapshots - ${DeviceNames}

infinityQuery.uql:
parse-json
| mv-expand "data"
| scope "data"
| project "name", "SystemUUID"="storage_system_id"
| jsonata "$[name='${DeviceNames}']"
| project "SystemUUID"
